Title: The Box of Polaroids
Writer: Hayley Tyler, Brian Yorkey, Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by), Kirk A. Moore (executive story editor)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Threats against Clay and the others escalate. Tyler faces disciplinary action. Justin testifies about Bryce, putting his own future at risk.
